content:
# elizaos-plugins/registry Daily Update (Feb 8, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
The day saw significant expansion of the plugin registry with the addition of several new plugins, enhancing ElizaOS's capabilities across transaction validation, financial services, and data integration.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### New Plugin Integrations for Enhanced Agent Capabilities
Multiple new plugins were added to the registry, broadening the functional scope for ElizaOS agents. This includes `@proofgate/eliza-plugin` for transaction validation guardrails ([#254](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/254), [#257](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/257)), `plugin-coinrailz` for crypto micropayment services ([#245](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/245)), and `@kamiyo/eliza` for escrow payments and dispute resolution on Solana ([#246](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/246)).

### Expanding Data and Financial Service Offerings
The registry now includes `@zane-archer/plugin-aimo-router` for accessing models from AiMo Network ([#247](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/247)), `@elizaos/plugin-sportradar` for live sports data integration ([#250](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/250)), and AsterPay for x402 payments with EUR off-ramp ([#251](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/251)).

### Marketplace and Trading Plugin Additions
Further additions include `plugin-moltbazaar` for an AI Agent Job Marketplace on Base ([#255](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/255)) and the Arthur DEX plugin for perpetual trading on Orderly Network ([#256](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/256)).

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
No new pull requests were opened today.

## CLOSED ISSUES
No issues were closed today.

## NEW ISSUES
No new issues were reported today.

## ACTIVE ISSUES
No active issues with more than 3 comments.
